about_the_game:
Mumbo Shuffle is a teletext deckbuilding roguelike with creatures known as Mumbos. Select a deck with a Mumbo, help guide your Mumbo for snacks and surf channels to see where else you might go...

Aiming for the top with your Mumbo, you will need to play poker hands to gain points to defeat the round's sound. This can be done by playing, discarding and jumbling to get the optimal hand to play. Make sure to keep your Mumbo's power and type in mind with how you play each round.

Your Mumbo's power can encourage different playstyles. Your Mumbo's type can be advantageous with doubling your hands score against a boss round or disastrous with it halving your hands score short of beating the boss round.    

  • 90 Channels, each having their own strange quirk

  • 9 Decks that is accompanied by a Mumbo of a type to choose from for each run

  • 9 types that Mumbos and Boss rounds can be

Submerse yourself into the galaxy of this teletext deckbuilder and see where channel surfing will take you...
